product_name: ExOfficio Sol Cool T-Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The ExOfficio Sol Cool(TM) T-Shirt with Icefil(R) technology is engineered to keep you cool and comfortable during hot, sunny days on the hiking trail. Icefil fabric features xylitol, a naturally occuring compound in birch trees, to cool your body when the fabric contacts moisture; may lower body temperature up to 5degF. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Lightweight polyester fabric with spandex absorbs sweat and disperses it quickly for fast drying. Seams are moved off of the shoulders to prevent rubbing when you're wearing a pack. Antimicrobial finish helps reduce odors. ExOfficio Sol Cool(TM) T-Shirt has underarm gussets that allow great mobility. Closeout.
short_description: The ExOfficio Sol Cool(TM) T-Shirt with Icefil(R) technology is engineered to keep you cool and comfortable during hot, sunny days on the hiking trail.
